backend/main.mo: Main backend actor handling registration, login, session storage, and user profiles with credential maps and access control integration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new session formats and providing a stubbed migration that initializes a new empty sessionStore.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing improved frontend registration error reporting and listing related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles in authentication, navigation, settings, layout, and server/channel UI.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component wiring authentication, profile setup, navigation, theming, and layout with backend connection handling.
frontend/src/auth/authMessages.ts: Centralized auth-related user-facing messages plus helpers for error sanitization, categorization, and registration error mapping.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Authentication context provider managing session restoration, login, registration, session validation, and error mapping via backend actor.
frontend/src/auth/sessionStorage.ts: Utility for saving, loading, and clearing normalized session data in localStorage with expiration handling.
frontend/src/auth/useAuth.ts: Exports a hook that returns authentication context for components.
Layout wrapper for auth pages providing centered card UI with title, description, and logo.
frontend/src/components/channels/Categor: Renders a category with its channels, supporting admin-only drag-and-drop ordering and channel creation.
frontend/src/components/channels/CreateC: Dialog for creating a new channel category with backend validation and error handling.
Dialog for adding text or voice channels to a category with mutation and form state management.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message input box for sending text channel messages with backend readiness checks.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatView.ts: Displays messages for the selected channel, auto-scrolls, and includes composer and header actions.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders a chat message with avatar, author info, timestamp, and click-to-view profile handling.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Discov: Displays discoverable community servers with search filtering and join actions.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Server: Shows a styled card for a server including name, description, member count, and a join button.
frontend/src/components/dms/DMHomeView.t: Shows the DM home view or friends list, with an empty-state message when no DMs exist.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendRo: Displays a friend's avatar, name, status, and action buttons for messaging, calling, and more options.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsH: Provides tabs for viewing friends, pending requests, and adding friends with request actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSh: Desktop layout container combining server rail, sidebar, main content, and optional member list.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainConte: Chooses and renders the correct main view based on navigation state, including settings and channel types.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Mobile layout with slide-out sheets for servers, channels, members, and access to user settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Switches between mobile and desktop shells based on window size.
frontend/src/components/members/MemberLi: Lists server members with avatars and allows selecting a member; includes per-member row rendering.
frontend/src/components/nav/ChannelSideb: Renders the server channel sidebar with category listing, drag-and-drop reordering, and create-category dialog handling.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTopBar: Displays a mobile top navigation bar with server title and quick-access buttons for servers, channels, members, and settings.
frontend/src/components/nav/ServerRail.t: Shows the vertical server list rail with home, server icons, ordering, and create-server button.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Provides a dialog for first‑time profile setup where users submit a display name.
frontend/src/components/profile/RoleAssi: Dialog for assigning and removing server roles from a user with pending-state handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: Displays a user profile overlay with avatar, banner, roles, and optional role‑management dialog.
frontend/src/components/servers/CreateSe: Dialog for creating a new server with name and description inputs and backend action guarding.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerIc: Displays a server’s icon if available or a fallback with the server’s initial letter.
frontend/src/components/settings/ServerS: Dialog for creating text or voice channels, handling input, category selection, and mutation submission.
Dialog allowing users to move a channel to another category, validating and submitting the move action.
Shows server members, their roles, and provides a way to open a role management dialog for the selected member.
Fetches and displays sorted audit log entries for the selected server with formatting helpers.
Displays categories and channels, supports creating channels and reordering them using persisted ordering.
Provides a form for viewing and editing server description, media URLs, and community mode, with save functionality via update mutation.
Allows selecting a server member, viewing their roles, and opening a dialog to manage role assignments.
Displays existing roles and provides UI to create new roles with color selection and permissions setup.
Renders the server settings layout with a sidebar to switch pages and loads the selected settings page.
frontend/src/components/settings/UserSet: Lets users switch theme modes and adjust text scale using radio buttons and a slider.
Loads and edits user profile fields, username, and account email, providing save actions for profile and username updates.
Renders the user settings layout with a sidebar for navigating profile and appearance settings and includes logout handling.
frontend/src/components/system/BackendCo: Shows connection status to the backend, including loading and error states with recovery instructions and a retry option.
Renders a stage channel UI with static speaker and audience lists plus a raise-hand button.
Displays a voice channel interface with participant lists, connection state, and join/leave handling tied to backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActionGuard: Provides a simple disabled state and optional reason based on backend connection status.
Tracks backend connection readiness by combining safe actor initialization with a minimal health check.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login, logout, stored identity loading, and exposes identity state via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Detects whether the viewport width is below a breakpoint to determine mobile layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Logs the user out via the auth provider and clears all React Query cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend queries and mutations for profiles, usernames, servers, channels, and more with connection-aware error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Safely initializes an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, handling retries and validating required methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines CSS variables for themes, global styles, and utility transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Implements sign-in and sign-up UI with validation, error handling, and tabbed forms.
frontend/src/state/navigation.ts: Provides navigation context managing views, server/channel selection, and UI state flags.
frontend/src/state/notifications.ts: Stores and retrieves notification overrides in localStorage and checks mute status for servers or channels.
frontend/src/state/settings.ts: Manages user settings such as theme, accent color, text scale, notifications, and keybinds with persistence.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Defines extended TypeScript interfaces mirroring backend entities like servers, channels, roles, and audit logs.
frontend/src/utils/channelOrdering.ts: Applies and builds ordering for categories and channels based on persisted server ordering data.
frontend/src/utils/hideElementByXPath.ts: Provides utilities to remove a DOM element by XPath and monitor for re-insertion via MutationObserver.
frontend/src/utils/roleColor.ts: Provides functions to sanitize hex color strings and determine light/dark luminance for contrast selection.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout that rejects if it exceeds the specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project state metadata including issues, feature requests, and versioning info for Caffeine Chat.
